aic2021.user

Interface UnitController


  • public interface UnitController
    Each unit has associated an instance of this class. It allows the unit to interact with the environment.

    • Method Summary

      • canMove

        boolean canMove()
        Returns if this unit can move this turn. Returns true if and only if it is not a structure and its movement cooldown is strictly less than 1. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can move this turn.

      • canAttack

        boolean canAttack()
        Returns if this unit can attack this turn. Returns true its attack cooldown is strictly less than 1. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can attack this turn.

      • getResourcesCarried

        int[] getResourcesCarried()
        Returns an array with the amount of resources being carried by this unit. The position i of the array contains the amount of the ith resource being carried. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        an array with the amount of resources being carried by this unit.

      • getType

        UnitType getType()
        Returns the type of this unit. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the type of this unit.

      • canLightTorch

        boolean canLightTorch()
        Returns if this unit can light a torch. It costs 5 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can light a torch.

      • lightTorch

        void lightTorch()
        This unit attempts to lights a torch. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 5 energy.

      • canMove

        boolean canMove(Direction direction)
        Returns if a unit can move following the given direction. It receives a penalty if the given direction is null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        direction - Given direction.
        Returns:
        if a unit can move following the given direction.

      • move

        void move(Direction direction)
        Attempts to move the unit following the given direction. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        direction - Given direction.

                     Location loc2)
        Returns if the segment connecting two given locations is obstructed by a mountain. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:

        loc2 - Second location
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        if the unit can attack the given location.

      • canThrowTorch

        boolean canThrowTorch(Location loc)

        Parameters:
        loc - Target location
        Returns:

      • attack

        void attack(Location loc)
        The unit attempts to attack a target location. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.

      • throwTorch

        void throwTorch(Location loc)
        The unit attempts to throw a torch at a target location. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.

      • canSenseLocation

        boolean canSenseLocation(Location loc)
        Returns if the unit can sense target location. It returns true if and only if the location is on the map, inside the unit's vision range, and if it has enough illumination. It receives a penalty if the given location is null. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.
        Returns:
        if the unit can sense target location.

      • senseResourceInfo

        ResourceInfo[] senseResourceInfo(Location loc)
        Returns the information about the resources at a given location. Position i of the array has the information of the ith resource (null if there is none). It receives a penalty if the location is null. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.
        Returns:
        the information about the resources at a given location.

      • isOutOfMap

        boolean isOutOfMap(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location is outside the map. It returns true if and only if the location is inside the unit's vision radius and outside of the map. It receives a penalty if the given location is null or outside of the unit's vision radius. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        if the given location is outside the map.

      • getVisibleLocations

        Location[] getVisibleLocations(int radiusSquared,
                               boolean onlyDetectable)
        Returns an array with all visible locations inside a given radius. It receives a penalty if the given radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        onlyDetectable - If set to false, it also includes locations inside the radius that the unit cannot sense (e.g., outside of the map or dark).
        Returns:
        an array with all visible locations inside a given radius.

      • getVisibleLocations

        Location[] getVisibleLocations(boolean onlyDetectable)
        Returns an array with all visible locations inside the unit's vision radius. It receives a penalty if the given radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        onlyDetectable - If set to false, it also includes locations inside the radius that the unit cannot sense (e.g., outside of the map or dark).
        Returns:
        an array with all visible locations inside the unit's vision radius.

      • senseUnitAtLocation

        UnitInfo senseUnitAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the unit at a given location. It returns null if there is no unit. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the unit at a given location.

      • hasWater

        boolean hasWater(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location has water or not. It receives a penalty if the unit cannot sense target location. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        Returns:
        if the given location has water or not.

      • hasMountain

        boolean hasMountain(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location has a mountain or not. It receives a penalty if the unit cannot sense target location. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        Returns:
        if the given location has a mountain or not.

      • hasTrap

        boolean hasTrap(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location has a trap or not. It receives a penalty if the unit cannot sense target location. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        Returns:
        if the given location has a trap or not.

      • senseFireAtLocation

        FireInfo senseFireAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location has a fire or not. It receives a penalty if the unit cannot sense target location. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        Returns:
        if the given location has a fire or not.

      • senseIllumination

        int senseIllumination(Location loc)
        Returns the illumination of target location. It receives a penalty if the unit cannot sense target location. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.
        Returns:
        the illumination of target location.

      • senseUnits

        UnitInfo[] senseUnits(int radiusSquared,
                      Team team)
        Returns an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. If the team is null, it returns the units of all teams. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it.

      • senseUnits

        UnitInfo[] senseUnits(Team team)
        Returns an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit. If the team is null, it returns the units of all teams. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it.

      • senseResources

        ResourceInfo[] senseResources(int radiusSquared,
                              Resource r)
        Returns an array with the info of all resources of a given type that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. If the type is null, it returns the units of all type. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        r - Given resource type
        Returns:
        an array with the info of all resources of a given type that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it.

      • senseMountains

        Location[] senseMountains(int radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with the location of all mountains that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        Returns:
        an array with the location of all mountains that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it.

        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        Returns:
        an array with the location of all traps that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it.

        void killSelf()

      • canSpawn

        boolean canSpawn(UnitType type,
                 Direction dir)
        Returns if this unit can create a unit of a given type following a given direction. It receives a penalty if either the type or direction are null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        type - Given type
        dir - Given direction
        Returns:
        if this unit can create a unit of a given type following a given direction.

           Direction dir)

        Parameters:
        type - Given type
        dir - Given direction

        void gatherResources()
        Attempts to gather the resources at this unit's location. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.

        Returns if this unit can deposit its resources in an adjacent Base or Settlement. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:

      • deposit

        void deposit()
        Attempts to deposit this unit's resources in an adjacent Base or Settlement. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.

      • isAccessible

        boolean isAccessible(Location loc)
        Returns if target location is accessible by this unit. It doesn't take into account other units. It receives a penalty if target location can't be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location
        Returns:
        if target location is accessible by this unit.

      • canDisarm

        boolean canDisarm(Location loc)
        Returns if this unit can disarm a trap at a given location. It receives a penalty if target location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        if this unit can disarm a trap at a given location.

      • disarm

        void disarm(Location loc)
        Attempts to disarm a trap at target location. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.

        Attempts to draw target code at ths unit's location. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.

      • canRead

        boolean canRead(Location loc)
        Returns if this unit can read the rock art painted at target location. It receives a penalty if target location is null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - target location
        Returns:
        if this unit can read the rock art painted at target location.

      • read

        int read(Location loc)
        Returns the rock art painted at target location. It receives a penalty if target location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - target location
        Returns:
        the rock art painted at target location.

      • canMakeSmokeSignal

        boolean canMakeSmokeSignal()
        Returns if this unit can make a smoke signal. Returns true if and only if this unit has a light source and both of its cooldowns are strictly less than 1. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can make a smoke signal.

      • makeSmokeSignal

        void makeSmokeSignal(int code)
        Attempts to broadcast a given code through a smoke signal. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        code - target code

      • canReadSmokeSignals

        boolean canReadSmokeSignals()
        Returns if this unit can read smoke signals. It returns true if and only if this unit is not a wolf or if the technology 'Eugenenics' has been researched. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can read smoke signals.

      • canResearchTechnology

        boolean canResearchTechnology(Technology tech)
        Returns if this unit can research the given technology. Returns true if and only if this unit is the base and its team has the necessary requirements. It receives a penalty if target technology is null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        tech - Given technology.
        Returns:
        if this unit can research the given technology.

      • researchTechnology

        void researchTechnology(Technology tech)
        Attempts to research target technology. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        tech - Target technology.

      • isResearched

        boolean isResearched(Technology tech)
        Returns if the given technology has been researched by this team. It costs 5 energy.
        Parameters:
        tech - Given technology
        Returns:
        if the given technology has been researched by this team.

      • readSmokeSignals

        int[] readSmokeSignals()
        Returns an array containing all current smoke signals. It receives a penalty if this unit can't read smoke signals. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        an array containing all current smoke signals.

        int getRound()
        Returns current game round. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:

        Returns the fraction of remaining energy over this unit's total energy. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:

        Returns the percentage of this unit's total energy used so far. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the percentage of this unit's total energy used so far.

      • println

        void println(java.lang.Object o)
        Prints an object o for debug purposes. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        o - given object.

      • drawPointDebug

        void drawPointDebug(Location loc,
                    int r,
                    int g,
                    int b)
        Draws a point on the map at a given location and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates). It receives a penalty if the location is null or if the color scheme is not valid. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        r - r-coordinate
        g - g-coordinate
        b - b-coordinate

      • drawLineDebug

        void drawLineDebug(Location fromLoc,
                   Location toLoc,
                   int r,
                   int g,
                   int b)
        Draws a segment on the map between a given pair of locations and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates). It receives a penalty if any of the location are null or if the color scheme is not valid. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        fromLoc - First location.
        toLoc - Second location.
        r - r-coordinate
        g - g-coordinate
        b - b-coordinate

      • getResource

        int getResource(Resource r)
        Returns the amount of resource of a given type available for this team. It costs 1 energy.
        Parameters:
        r - Resource type.
        Returns:
        the amount of resource of a given type available for this team.

      • getRandomDouble

        double getRandomDouble()
        Returns a randomly generated double. If this is the only random method used by both teams, all of their games with a fixed seed are identical. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        a randomly generated double.

      • getTechLevel

        int getTechLevel(Team team)
        Returns the given team's technology level. If the given team is the opponent and this team has not yet researched 'Rock Art', it returns 0. There is a penalty if the given team is null. It costs 5 energy.
        Parameters:
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        the given team's technology level.

      • hasResearched

        boolean hasResearched(Technology tech,
                      Team team)
        Returns if the given team has researched the given technology. If the given team is the opponent and this team has not yet researched 'Rock Art', it returns false. There is a penalty if the given team is null. It costs 5 energy.
        Parameters:
        tech - Given technology
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        if the given team has researched the given technology.

      • yield

        void yield()
        Halts this unit's execution until the next round. It costs 1 energy.
